memberdef.argsstring: (int *iwork, double *rwork, int nPoints, double t, double *x, double *u)
memberdef.name: PlaneCouetteFlow_u

briefdescription.para: Couette Flow between two parallel plates. One moving relative to the other with constant seperation (width).

detaileddescription.para:
iwork
NOT USED
rwork[0]
velocity of moving plate in the x-dir, $ vx $
rwork[1]
width between plates, $ h $
rwork[2]
x-axis offset, $ xs $
rwork[3]
y-axis offset, $ ys $
rwork[4]
z-axis offset, $ zs $
nPoints
total number of points
t
NOT USED
x
input array
u
output array
x-momentum equation \[ \nabla^2 u_x = 0 \] \[ u(y) = \frac{vx}{h} * y\] \[ u(0) = 0 \] \[ u(h) = vx \]
Axis of origin: at bottom plate

memberdef.name: LinearADR_Sine

briefdescription.para: Linear Avection Diffusion Reaction Sine function.

detaileddescription.para:
iwork
NOT USED
rwork[0:2]
$ \omega[0:2] $
rwork[3]
$ \omega_0 $
nPoints
total number of points
t
NOT USED
x
input array
u
output array
An exact solution and source term for

para.formula: \[ \nabla \cdot (\vec b u - \ddot a \nabla u) + c u + d = 0 \]

detaileddescription.para: where
also returns the advective, diffusive, and total velocity at a point.

memberdef.argsstring: (int *iwork, double *rwork, int nPoints, double t, double *x, double *u, double *dr)
memberdef.name: LinearADR_Sine_dr

briefdescription.para: Linear Avection Diffusion Reaction Sine function (dr)

detaileddescription.para:
iwork
NOT USED
rwork[0:2]
$ \omega[0:2] $
rwork[3]
$ \omega_0 $
rwork[4:6]
$ b[0:2] $
rwork[7:15]
$ a[0:3,0:3] $
rwork[16]
$ c $
nPoints
total number of points
t
NOT USED
x
input array
u
output array
dr
output array
An exact solution and source term for

para.formula: \[ \nabla \cdot (\vec b u - \ddot a \nabla u) + c u + d = 0 \]

detaileddescription.para: where

para.formula: \[ u(x) = sin[\vec \omega \cdot \vec x + \omega_0) ] = sin(Ax - b) \f \f[r(u,x) = - ((\ddot a \vec \omega) \cdot \vec \omega) u - (\vec b \cdot \vec \omega) cos(Ax - b)\]

detaileddescription.para: also returns the advective, diffusive, and total velocity at a point.

memberdef.argsstring: (int *iwork, double *rwork, int nPoints, double t, double *x, double *u)
memberdef.name: PlanePoiseuilleFlow_u

briefdescription.para: Poiseuille Flow between two parallel fixed plates with constant seperation (width).

detaileddescription.para:
iwork
NOT USED
rwork[0]
width between the plates, $ h $
rwork[1]
viscosity of fluid, $ \mu $
rwork[2]
the pressure gradient, $ \nabla p $ (neg)
rwork[3]
the rate of flow per unit width, $ q $
rwork[4]
x-axis offset, $ xs $
rwork[5]
y-axis offset, $ ys $
rwork[6]
z-axis offset, $ zs $
nPoints
total number of points
t
NOT USED
x
input array
u
output array
x-momentum equation \[ (\nabla p + \mu \nabla^2 u)_x = 0 \] \[ u(y) = 4 u_{max} y (\frac{h-y}{h^2}) \] \[ u(0) = u(h) = 0 \] \[ u(h/2) = u_{max} \] \[u_{max} = \frac{-\nabla p}{8 \mu} h^2 = \frac{3}{2} \frac{q}{h} \]

$ u_{max} $ = maximum velocity at the centerline Axis of origin: at bottom plate
status code

memberdef.argsstring: (int *iwork, double *rwork, int nPoints, double t, double *x, double *u)
memberdef.name: PoiseuillePipeFlow

briefdescription.para: Poiseuille Flow through a circular pipe.

detaileddescription.para:
iwork
NOT USED
rwork[0]
radius of pipe, $ R $
rwork[1]
viscosity of fluid, $ \mu $
rwork[2]
the pressure gradient, $ \nabla p $ (neg)
rwork[3]
the rate of flow, $ Q $
rwork[4]
x-axis offset, $ xs $
rwork[5]
y-axis offset, $ ys $
rwork[6]
z-axis offset, $ zs $
nPoints
total number of points
t
NOT USED
x
input array
u
output array
x-momentum equation \[ (\nabla p + \mu \nabla^2 u)_x = 0 \] \[ u(r) = u_{max} (1 - \frac{r^2}{R^2}) \] \[ u(0) = u_{max} \] \[ u(R) = 0 \] \[ u_{max} = -\nabla p \frac{R^2}{4 \mu}= \frac{2Q}{\pi R^2}\]
$ u_{max} $ = maximum velocity at the centerline Axis of origin: at center of pipe

memberdef.argsstring: (int *iwork, double *rwork, int nPoints, double t, double *x, double *u)
memberdef.name: PoiseuillePipeFlow_P

briefdescription.para: Poiseuille Flow through a circular pipe.

detaileddescription.para: $ p_0 =p(L)$ = 0, the atmospheric pressure at the outflow Axis of origin: at center of pipe
